Articles.Content: I'm having a bit of a problem where engines are just not working at all besides some stock ones. I play with quite a large amount of mods, so I'm sure that one of them or not having one is the problem. Not sure if there is something in particular that causes this.

You’d need to post your logs, maybe a screenshot…

A common cause of “engines not working” is placing them in a position where the thrust hits some other part on your ship. Could that be the case for you?
